mapper.select: SELECT id, stream_id, user_id, user_name, title, description, url, thumbnail_url, view_count, created_at, published_at, viewable, language, type, duration FROM video_twitch WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video_twitch(id, stream_id, user_id, user_name, title, description, url, thumbnail_url, view_count, created_at, published_at, viewable, language, type, duration) VALUES(#{id}, #{stream_id}, #{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{title}, #{description}, #{url}, #{thumbnail_url}, #{view_count}, #{created_at}, #{published_at} , #{viewable} , #{language} , #{type}, #{duration} )
